title: Ruby on Rails Development
headingText: of web development using Ruby on Rails
description: BigBinary has 12+ years of experience working with Ruby on Rails. We were early adopters of Ruby on Rails after realising its exceptional productivity compared to other technologies. We worked with Ruby on Rails and started contributing towards it, leading to our in-depth understanding of the framework's intricacies. Through these contributions, we not only enhanced our skills but also shared our knowledge by writing blogs.
metaDescription: Expert Ruby on Rails development services with 12+ years of experience building scalable web applications
metaKeywords: Ruby on Rails, web development, Ruby, Rails consulting

features.title: API Development
features.description: We build robust and well-documented APIs using Ruby on Rails that integrate seamlessly with frontend applications.

features.title: Database Optimization
features.description: Our team ensures your Rails application's database is properly structured, indexed, and optimized for performance.

features.title: Rails Upgrades
features.description: We help upgrade legacy Rails applications to the latest version, ensuring security and performance improvements.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: We identify and fix performance bottlenecks in your Rails application to ensure maximum speed and efficiency.

caseStudies.title: E-commerce Platform Optimization
caseStudies.description: Improved load times by 70% for a high-traffic Rails e-commerce platform by optimizing database queries and implementing caching.

caseStudies.title: Healthcare Management System
caseStudies.description: Built a HIPAA-compliant healthcare management system using Rails with custom authentication and authorization.

caseStudies.title: FinTech Application
caseStudies.description: Developed a secure financial services platform with Rails backend, handling millions of transactions daily.

title: React.js Development
headingText: of creating modern UIs using React.js
description: Our team has extensive experience in building responsive, high-performance web applications with React.js. We focus on creating engaging user interfaces with modern React features including hooks, context API, and server components. Our expertise helps businesses deliver seamless user experiences across all devices and platforms.

features.description: Our team ensures your React application loads quickly and runs smoothly through code splitting, lazy loading, and memoization.

title: React Native Development
headingText: of mobile app development using React Native
description: We create cross-platform mobile applications using React Native, delivering native-like performance and user experience while maintaining a single codebase for iOS and Android. Our React Native expertise allows us to build feature-rich mobile apps that work seamlessly across different devices and operating systems.
metaDescription: Professional React Native development services for cross-platform mobile applications with native performance
metaKeywords: React Native, mobile app development, cross-platform, iOS, Android

features.description: Our team can integrate native modules and third-party SDKs to enhance your React Native application's capabilities.

title: API Development

description: We provide comprehensive API development services, creating robust and secure RESTful and GraphQL APIs that enable seamless integration between different systems and applications. Our API expertise ensures that your systems can communicate efficiently while maintaining security and performance standards.
